original_text: If you agree to live in that way, you will die. Instead, you should let God's Spirit help you with his power. Then you can stop doing the wrong things that your bodies want to do. As a result, you will have life with God.
korean_text: 너희가 육신대로 살면 반드시 죽을 것이로되 영으로써 몸의 행실을 죽이면 살리니

sentences.original_text: If you agree to live in that way
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 당신이 그런 방식으로 살기로 동의한다면

sentences.original_text: you should let God's Spirit help you
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 하나님의 영이 당신을 돕게 해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: Then you can stop doing the wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 당신은 잘못된 것들을 멈출 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: that your bodies want to do
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 육체가 하고 싶어 하는 것들

sentences.original_text: you will have life with God
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 하나님과 함께 생명을 누릴 것입니다
